A NEW WAY TO PLAY Roll up your sleeves and get hands-on with your very own chemistry set, then strap on your VR goggles and immerse yourself in the unseen world of atoms and molecules all around you! Our innovative blend of physical play and immersive digital content creates hours of fun and exciting experiences!     GET MESSY, LEARN, REPEAT Create chemical reactions that explode into colorful fizzy eruptions, grow a crystal mountain, make your own glow stick and so much more! Kids will have an absolute blast doing their own experiments and discovering the STEAM principles behind them. Step-by-step instructions with pictures and videos ensure all projects are kid-friendly and safe while providing the fizzy, messy, gross fun that kids love!     WHAT’S IN THE BOX? This 23-piece chemistry set is loaded with all the tools and chemicals young scientists need to kickstart their learning adventure, including VR goggles and an interactive 44-page book packed with trusted lessons from Bill Nye! It’s the perfect gift for curious boys and girls that will spark the imagination and inspire a life-long love of learning! For ages 8 and up.     APP INCLUDED Download the app on your smartphone, put on the VR goggles, and step inside Bill Nye’s virtual lab in stunning VR! Compatible with all smartphones with access to Google Play store and Apple iOS App Store. All smartphone mobile devices have been tested to fit into the goggles, including “max” and plus size phones. Goggles are not compatible with tablets.
